statements: SELECT * FROM geothermal_assets;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_location FROM geothermal_assets;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, installation_date FROM geothermal_assets WHERE asset_type = 'Drilling Equipment';
SELECT asset_name, asset_location, installation_date FROM geothermal_assets ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM geothermal_assets WHERE asset_location = 'California' AND maintenance_due_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_location FROM geothermal_assets WHERE asset_type = 'Geothermal Well' ORDER BY installation_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM geothermal_assets WHERE asset_location LIKE '%New Zealand%' AND installation_date >= '2020-01-01' AND installation_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT asset_type FROM geothermal_assets ORDER BY asset_type;
SELECT asset_name, installation_date, maintenance_due_date, maintenance_notes FROM geothermal_assets WHERE maintenance_due_date < CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY maintenance_due_date ASC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type, asset_location, installation_date, maintenance_due_date FROM geothermal_assets ORDER BY asset_type DESC, installation_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM pipelines;
SELECT pipeline_name, pipeline_length, pipeline_material FROM pipelines;
SELECT pipeline_id, pipeline_name, pipeline_length, pipeline_diameter FROM pipelines WHERE pipeline_material = 'Steel';
SELECT * FROM pipelines ORDER BY pipeline_length DESC;
SELECT pump_name, pump_type, pump_capacity FROM pumps WHERE pump_status = 'Active';
SELECT pipeline_id, pipeline_name, pipeline_length FROM pipelines;
SELECT * FROM pipelines WHERE pipeline_material='Steel';
SELECT pipeline_id, pipeline_name, pipeline_capacity FROM pipelines ORDER BY pipeline_capacity DESC;
SELECT pipeline_name, pipeline_diameter, pipeline_material FROM pipelines WHERE pipeline_length > 100 ORDER BY pipeline_diameter ASC;
SELECT * FROM pumps WHERE pump_status='Active' AND pump_capacity > 500 ORDER BY pump_capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM pipelines;
SELECT id, name, length FROM pipelines WHERE temperature > 100;
SELECT * FROM pumps ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, type, power FROM pumps WHERE efficiency > 80;
SELECT id, location, status FROM assets WHERE installation_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM pipelines WHERE temperature > 50 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, length FROM pipelines WHERE diameter < 500 ORDER BY length DESC;
SELECT id, name, type FROM pumps WHERE power > 1000 AND efficiency < 80 ORDER BY type;
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE status = 'active' AND installation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT id, location, status FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'pipe' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM pipelines;
SELECT pipeline_name, pipeline_length FROM pipelines ORDER BY pipeline_length DESC;
SELECT pump_name, pump_capacity FROM pumps WHERE pump_capacity > 1000;
SELECT maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT asset_id, latitude, longitude FROM asset_locations WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -100;
SELECT pipeline_id, pipeline_name, pipeline_length FROM pipelines WHERE pipeline_length > 100 ORDER BY pipeline_id DESC;
SELECT pump_name, pump_capacity, pump_model FROM pumps WHERE pump_capacity < 500 ORDER BY pump_name ASC;
SELECT pipeline_name, pipeline_diameter FROM pipelines WHERE pipeline_diameter BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY pipeline_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT pump_id, pump_name, pump_capacity, pump_model FROM pumps WHERE pump_capacity > 1000 ORDER BY pump_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM pipelines;
SELECT id, name, material FROM pumps WHERE type = 'Centrifugal';
SELECT name, address FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40.0 AND longitude < -100.0;
SELECT id, maintenance_date, technician FROM maintenance_logs ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT type_name, description FROM asset_types WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM pipelines ORDER BY name DESC, length ASC;
SELECT name, diameter, material FROM pipelines WHERE diameter > 3.0 ORDER BY diameter DESC;
SELECT pumps.name, pumps.capacity, locations.address FROM pumps INNER JOIN locations ON pumps.id = locations.id WHERE pumps.status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive Maintenance' AND technician = 'John Doe';
SELECT asset_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
